content
string<p><img src="https://static.kisdigital.com/images/jasper/getting-started-00-cover.jpeg" alt="Cover" /></p> <p>Jasper does not require any backend to operate so it is very easy to get up and running. If you are famiilar with ColdBox, even more so.</p> <p>There are a few important directories for Jasper:</p> <ul> <li><strong>/posts</strong> - This folder is where the markdown is stored for blog posts</li> <li><strong>/pages</strong> - This folder has markdown pages that will be rendered, such as the readme file above</li> <li><strong>/assets</strong> - This folder should contain all the assets you will need in production. This directory will be copied to the <code>/dist</code> folder as part of the build process</li> <li><strong>/dist</strong> - This foler contains the HTML when it is generated</li> </ul> <p>Creating a post with Jasper is easy as creating a new markdown file with the proper front matter. Start the development server with <code>box server start</code> and you can see how the blog will look in production. There is no &quot;live reload&quot; that you might expect with webpack or other HTML build systems, but you can manually reload the page to see your changes.</p> <p>Jasper uses ColdBox to render all HTML. Here are a few important files to be aware of.</p> <ul> <li><strong>/handlers/Main</strong> - The main ColdBox handler for the home page. This handler is also used for generating other pages on the blog like the 404 page, etc.</li> <li><strong>/handlers/Page</strong> - This handler renders markdown content that is not a post</li> <li><strong>/handlers/Post</strong> - This handler renders blog posts as well as filtering by tag</li> <li><strong>/handlers/Manage</strong> - This hanlder controls building blog content</li> <li><strong>/layouts/Main.cfm</strong> - This is the main layout file for the blog. ColdBox supports multiple layouts, add as many layouts as you want.</li> <li><strong>/models/JasperConfig</strong> - Customize your Jasper Configuration</li> <li><strong>/models/PageService</strong> - This component contains is responsible for reading front matter and markdown for pages</li> <li><strong>/models/PostService</strong> - This component contains the methods responsible for reading front matter, markdown, and listing posts. Post service also handles writing oout opengraph and twitter metadata to ensure your post is properly attributed when shared</li> <li><strong>/models/ManageService</strong> - This component contains the methods responsible for writing the HTML out to the <code>/dist</code> folder</li> </ul> <h3>Configuring Settings (JasperConfig)</h3> <pre><code class="language-javascript">component output = &quot;false&quot; { // return the config function getConfig() { return { 'meta': { // Jasper metadata used in site layout 'title': &quot;Jasper&quot;, // title bar 'description': &quot;A description of your blog&quot;, // meta description 'author': &quot;Jasper&quot;, 'url': &quot;https://example.com&quot; }, 'contentPages': [ // Coldbox pages to generate and where to write it to { action: &quot;main.index&quot;, file: &quot;index.html&quot; }, { action: &quot;main.notfound&quot;, file: &quot;404.html&quot; }, { action: &quot;main.search&quot;, file: &quot;search.html&quot; } ] } } } </code></pre> <p>Currently there are only minimal settings available.</p> <h3>Generating Static Content</h3> <p>Once the content has been created it is time to generate the static site. Currently the Manage handler has to main actions:</p> <ul> <li>build - Attempts to build the site content, copies the dist folder to a production repo</li> <li>deploy - Builds the content, copies <code>dist/</code> folder to the production repo, calls a bash script to commit the changes and push it to GitHub.</li> </ul> <p>The build is triggered by hitting the build URL, http://127.0.0.1:60783/manage/build for example. If successful you should see a message like <code>10 document(s) generated in 112 ms.</code>The build process builds a list of all pages, posts, and tags and calls each one using <code>cfhttp</code>; the resulting HTML is then written to disk. This process also generates an RSS 2.0 XML feed for your posts.</p> <p>This is process is handled in <code>ManageService.generateStaticContent()</code> and <code>ManageService.generateFeedXml</code>.</p>

string<p><img src="https://static.kisdigital.com/images/marvel/00_anthology.jpeg" alt="Cover" /></p> <p>The Marvel Cinematic Universe is the shared universe of superhero films based on characters that appear in American comic books published by Marvel Comics. Since I have largely been working from home since the onset of COVID-19, I thought it might be a good time to go through the list of movies and create a playlist of all the movies in order.</p> <h3>Captain America: The First Avenger (2011)</h3> <p><img src="https://static.kisdigital.com/images/marvel/01_captain_america.png" alt="Captain America" /></p> <p>Set during World War II, Steve Rogers, a sickly man, is transformed into the super-soldier Captain America and must stop the Red Skull from using the Tesseract as an energy-source for world domination.</p> <h3>Captain Marvel (2019)</h3> <p><img src="https://static.kisdigital.com/images/marvel/02_captain_marvel.jpeg" alt="Captain Marvel" /></p> <p>Set in 1995, Carol Danvers becomes one of the universe's most powerful heroes when Earth is caught in the middle of a galactic war between two alien races.</p> <h3>Iron Man (2008)</h3> <p><img src="https://static.kisdigital.com/images/marvel/03_iron_man.jpg" alt="Iron Man" /></p> <p>After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.</p> <h3>Iron Man 2 (2010)</h3> <p><img src="https://static.kisdigital.com/images/marvel/04_iron_man_2.png" alt="Iron Man 2" /></p> <p>With the world now aware of his identity as Iron Man, Tony Stark must contend with both his declining health and a vengeful mad man with ties to his father's legacy.</p> <h3>The Incredible Hulk (2008)</h3> <p><img src="https://static.kisdigital.com/images/marvel/05_the_incredible_hulk.jpg" alt="The Incredible Hult" /></p> <p>Bruce Banner, a scientist on the run from the U.S. Government, must find a cure for the monster he turns into whenever he loses his temper.</p> <h3>Thor (2011)</h3> <p><img src="https://static.kisdigital.com/images/marvel/06_thor.png" alt="Thor" /></p> <p>The powerful but arrogant god Thor is cast out of Asgard to live amongst humans in Midgard (Earth), where he soon becomes one of their finest defenders.</p> <h3>The Avengers (2012)</h3> <p><img src="https://static.kisdigital.com/images/marvel/07_the_avengers.jpg" alt="The Avengers" /></p> <p>The Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.</p> <h3>Iron Man 3 (2013)</h3> <p><img src="https://static.kisdigital.com/images/marvel/08_iron_man_3.jpg" alt="Iron Man 3" /></p> <p>When Tony Stark's world is torn apart by a formidable terrorist called the Mandarin, he starts an odyssey of rebuilding and retribution.</p> <h3>Thor: The Dark World (2013)</h3> <p><img src="https://static.kisdigital.com/images/marvel/09_thor_the_dark_world.jpg" alt="Thor: The Dark World" /></p> <p>When the Dark Elves attempt to plunge the universe into darkness, Thor must embark on a perilous and personal journey that will reunite him with doctor Jane Foster.</p> <h3>Captain America: The Winter Soldier (2014)</h3> <p><img src="https://static.kisdigital.com/images/marvel/10_captain_america_the_winter_soldier.jpg" alt="Captain America: The Winter Soldier" /></p> <p>In the ninth movie in the MCU Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world, he teams up with a fellow Avenger and S.H.I.E.L.D agent, Black Widow, to battle a new threat from history: an assassin known as the Winter Soldier.</p> <h3>Guardians of the Galaxy (2014)</h3> <p><img src="https://static.kisdigital.com/images/marvel/11_guardians_of_the_galaxy.jpg" alt="Guardians of the Galaxy" /></p> <p>A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.</p> <h3>Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 (2017)</h3> <p><img src="https://static.kisdigital.com/images/marvel/12_guardians_of_the_galaxy_vol_2.jpg" alt="Guardians of the Galaxyy Vol. 2" /></p> <p>The Guardians struggle to keep together as a team while dealing with their personal family issues, notably Star-Lord's encounter with his father the ambitious celestial being Ego.</p> <h3>Avengers: Age of Ultron (2015)</h3> <p><img src="https://static.kisdigital.com/images/marvel/13_avengers_age_of_ultron.jpg" alt="Avengers: Age of Ultron" /></p> <p>When Tony Stark and Bruce Banner try to jump-start a dormant peacekeeping program called Ultron, things go horribly wrong and it's up to Earth's mightiest heroes to stop the villainous Ultron from enacting his terrible plan.</p> <h3>Ant-Man (2015)</h3> <p><img src="https://static.kisdigital.com/images/marvel/14_ant_man.jpg" alt="Ant-Man" /></p> <p>Armed with a super-suit with the astonishing ability to shrink in scale but increase in strength, cat burglar Scott Lang must embrace his inner hero and help his mentor, Dr. Hank Pym, plan and pull off a heist that will save the world.</p> <h3>Captain America: Civil War (2016)</h3> <p><img src="https://static.kisdigital.com/images/marvel/15_captain_america_civil_war.jpeg" alt="Captain America: Civil War" /></p> <p>Political involvement in the Avengers' affairs causes a rift between Captain America and Iron Man.</p> <h3>Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017)</h3> <p><img src="https://static.kisdigital.com/images/marvel/16_spiderman_homecoming.jpg" alt="Spider-Man: Homecoming" /></p> <p>Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.</p> <h3>Doctor Strange (2016)</h3> <p><img src="https://static.kisdigital.com/images/marvel/17_doctor_strange.jpg" alt="Doctor Strange" /></p> <p>While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts.</p> <h3>Black Panther (2018)</h3> <p><img src="https://static.kisdigital.com/images/marvel/18_black_panther.jpeg" alt="Black Panther" /></p> <p>T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and must confront a challenger from his country's past.</p> <h3>Thor Ragnarok (2017)</h3> <p><img src="https://static.kisdigital.com/images/marvel/19_thor_ragnarok.jpg" alt="Thor Ragnarok" /></p> <p>Imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, Thor must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnar√∂k, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela.</p> <h3>Ant-Man and the Wasp (2018)</h3> <p><img src="https://static.kisdigital.com/images/marvel/20_ant_man_and_the_wasp.jpg" alt="Ant-Man and thhe Wasp" /></p> <p>As Scott Lang balances being both a superhero and a father, Hope van Dyne and Dr. Hank Pym present an urgent new mission that finds the Ant-Man fighting alongside The Wasp to uncover secrets from their past.</p> <h3>Black Widow (2020)</h3> <p><img src="https://static.kisdigital.com/images/marvel/21_black_widow.jpg" alt="Black Widow" /></p> <p>A film about Natasha Romanoff in her quests between the films Civil War and Infinity War.</p> <h3>Avengers Infinity War (2018)</h3> <p><img src="https://static.kisdigital.com/images/marvel/22_avengers_infinity_war.jpeg" alt="Avengers Infinity War" /></p> <p>The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.</p> <h3>Avengers: End Game (2019)</h3> <p><img src="https://static.kisdigital.com/images/marvel/23_avengers_endgame.jpg" alt="Avengers: End Game" /></p> <p>After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.</p> <h3>Spiderman: Far from Home (2019)</h3> <p><img src="https://static.kisdigital.com/images/marvel/24_spiderman_far_from_home.jpg" alt="Spiderman: Far from Home" /></p> <p>Following the events of Avengers: Endgame (2019), Spider-Man must step up to take on new threats in a world that has changed forever.</p>
